title: Hour 1 - Dr Allen Sills (06-18-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Dr Allen Sills (06-18-20)
description:
The NFL chief medical Officer Dr Allen Sills tells Dan he is very optimistic about the upcoming NFL season. Dr Allen says we are fighting a novel virus that no one can predict.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
